alert.note: Alert for Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Brevard County through 445 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Port Canaveral, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cocoa Beach, Cape Canaveral, Port Canaveral, Playalinda Beach and Merritt Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter immediately inside a building or hard-topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
